name: home-assignment-algo
description: Ride assignment algorithm with greedy and min-cost flow strategies

scripts.start:greedy: npm run build:only && node dist/cli.js --strategy greedy --drivers data/drivers.json --rides data/rides.json
scripts.start:mincost: npm run build:only && node dist/cli.js --strategy mincost --drivers data/drivers.json --rides data/rides.json
scripts.dev: tsx watch src/cli.ts --strategy auto --drivers data/drivers.json --rides data/rides.json
